author: Special Correspondent
text:
The monthly grievance redressal meet for the provident fund subscribers will be held on April 11.

A statement said the ‘Nidhi Aapke Nikat’ (PF Near You) will be conducted by the Employees’ Provident Fund Organisation, Sub Regional Office, Tirunelveli. This is being conducted for speedy redressal of grievances of subscribers, beneficiaries, employers, trade unions, employers’ associations of Tirunelveli and Thoothukudi districts covered under the Employees’ Provident Fund and Miscellaneous Provisions Act, 1952.

The meet will be held between 10.30 a.m. and 5 p.m. at Sub Regional Office, Employees’ Provident Fund Organisation, situated at N.G.O. ‘B’ Colony, Perumalpuram, Tirunelveli – 627 007 for the benefit of aggrieved subscribers (between 10.30 a.m. and 1 p.m.), employers (3 p.m. and 4 p.m.) and exempted establishments (between 4 a.m. and 5 p.m.)

Petitioners, may send their representation or submit the same to this office in person on or before March 31 by furnishing their PF Code / account number and the nature of grievance to Saurabh Swami, Regional PF Commissioner, EPFO, Sub Regional Office, Perumalpuram, Tirunelveli-627 007, the statement said.
title: PF grievance redressal meet
